ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fourth Planet, a quarterly written by Fred Kennedy (Host, Teletoon at Night, The Edge) and brilliantly illustrated by Miko Maciaszek continues with its second exciting issue. The human refugees have their first encounter with the diminutive Yultan, and it quickly resorts to violence. Meanwhile the Foon perceive the human ship as a chariot of the gods, and set out to seek divine favor.
